frontmatter.title: Multilingual
frontmatter.text: Be accessible. The application is supported in multiple languages. These includes English, French, Spanish, Deutsche, Portuguese, Arabic, Ukrainian, Bahasa, and Russian

frontmatter.title: Scheduling tools
frontmatter.text: Liberate your time by automating integrated scheduling for your team, mentors, and experts

frontmatter.title: Smart tasks
frontmatter.text: Drive action by assigning tasks with comprehensive segmentation capabilities

frontmatter.title: Track e-mails
frontmatter.text: Gain clarity by sending tracked emails from within the platform to ensure receipt and interaction

frontmatter.title: Automate your e-mails
frontmatter.text: Become superhuman by customizing your emails and automating communication with users throughout the platform

frontmatter.title: Calendar Integration
frontmatter.text: Stay on top of everything by syncing your Google or Microsoft calendar with your AcceleratorApp calendar for easy, automated scheduling

frontmatter.title: Zapier Integration
frontmatter.text: Collaborate with others by integrating your processes across departments using zapier as a bridge between AcceleratorApp and your favorite apps

frontmatter.title: And more...
frontmatter.text: And more features integrated within the software to make your incubator/accelerator run more smoothly
